SEO.og:title: Leaps and Rebounds Mens Shorts | Mini Trampolines and Fitness Rebounders
SEO.og:description:
Now that we have shirts, why not wear our shorts and complete the outfit? These are Basketball-style shorts perfect for Rebounding or just lounging around the house! These are soft and breathable shorts that you can roll up or just leave unrolled. Specifics: 

6.0 oz., 100% polyester mesh
100% polyester tricot liner
Athletic cut and superior fit
Covered elastic waistband
Internal drawcord
Leaps and Rebounds logo in the corner


Lightweight and breathable fabric, our shorts will keep you feeling fresh even when the heat is on.
